description: Try our easy to follow Vegan Chickpea Burgers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Burger,Pescatarian,Plant-based,Low sugar,Halal,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Vegan,Quick & easy lunch,Jan Feb 2020,Peanut free
name: Vegan Chickpea Burgers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large frying pan over medium heat. Cut Turkish loaf into quarters and split each portion through the centre. Place cut-sides down in pan and lightly toast for 1 minute. Remove from pan.
Heat oil in same pan over medium heat. Cook veggie burger patties for 3-4 minutes on each side or until golden brown and heated through. Remove from pan and slice in half to fit bread, if necessary.
Spread bread bases with hummus, top with pepper, burger patties, sprouts and cucumber. Drizzle over mayonnaise and season. Top with bread lids to serve.
